title: In the Jaws of Danger
description:
When you’re not raised on superstitions, entities of lore can lure the most vulnerable into their clutches. If these tales didn’t have a shred of truth to them, why then do most cultures have them? Always heed the warnings of folklore or before you know it, you might quickly slip into the jaws of danger. First, Respect your elders or expect their regards. Next, will you answer the call of the Banshee? After that, The Berberoka rises to the surface to pull you down. And finally, fan mail for smile.dog and a case in defense of dogs.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: Studio71
